ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Permission.ByPassVR = FALSE, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Hub_Origin__c,'DEUKO1')), ISPICKVAL(Contact_reason__c, 'Quality complaints'), (AND( NegativeFeedback__c = false, PositiveFeedback__c = false) || ISBLANK(CustomerFeedback__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have selected "Quality complaints" as Contact Reason, please complete the "Customer Satisfaction" section.
